UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Nathan and his husband have decided to purchase a new car. They have narrowed their list to a few models and visited a few dealerships to see the models and test-drive them. Which stage of the consumer decision process does this illustrate?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Nathan and his husband are still visiting dealerships and taking test drives. They have not yet reached their purchase decision.
That’s not correct. It appears that Nathan and his husband have already done an information search and narrowed their alternatives down to a few models.
That’s not correct. Need recognition involves perceiving a difference between your actual state and your desired state.
It appears that Nathan and his husband have already done an information search and are now evaluating their new car alternatives.

detailedSolution: It appears that Nathan and his husband have already done an information search and are now evaluating their new car alternatives.
